Common Questions

What is Wizardshot?

Wizardshot is a web app & chrome extension . that allows you to create step-by-step tutorials simply by
capturing your screen.

How is Wizardshot Free?

The costs to run a service is really inexpensive as most of the processing happens in the Chrome extension.


Really - all that we have to pay for is super-secure hosting, awesome 24/7 support and that‚Äôs it.


We built Wizardshot as a stand-alone product with a deep Helpjuice Knowledge Base integration.
